data.title: Meet Our President
data.text:
Dr. Douglas Jackson

Be Inspired

“His global experience is second to none and the impact made by Project

C.U.R.E. is the envy of corporations and nonprofits around the world.”

– Karen Gerwitz, President, World Trade Center Denver

Dr. Douglas Jackson serves as the President/CEO of Project C.U.R.E. Each week, Project C.U.R.E. delivers approximately four semi-truck loads of donated medical supplies and equipment to desperately needy people around the world. Since 1987, Project C.U.R.E. has delivered equipment and supplies to hospitals and clinics in over 135 countries. Project C.U.R.E. is consistently recognized with the highest rankings from Guidestar and Charity Navigator, and was named by Forbes as one of the top 20 charities in America.

Testimonials From Around The Globe

“Doug Jackson’s speaking style is a crowd favorite on corporate social responsibility and engaging in

international trade for good. His global experience is second to none and the impact made by Project

C.U.R.E. is the envy of corporations and nonprofits around the world. Hearing Doug’s story of how the

company came about from some items in a garage to one of the top nonprofits known throughout the

world is inspiring for any audience.” – Karen Gerwitz, President, World Trade Center Denver

“I cannot thank you enough for the delivery of a very inspiring keynote address at the 29th International

Prostate Cancer Update Meeting. On behalf of Grand Rounds in Urology, we have made a $1,000

contribution through your website. We plan to challenge our community to support Project C.U.R.E. in an

email we will be sending to all of our attendees. We wish you continued success in providing

pharmaceuticals to many that have great need.” – William T, Carden, Jr. Carden Jennings Publishing

“Our members have had nothing but positive comments about your presentation. No doubt the useful

information you provided will help strengthen their diplomatic efforts abroad.” – Roger-Mark DeSouza,

President/CEO, Sister Cities International

“The Embassy of the Federal Republic of Nigeria in Washington, DC is proud to be associated with your

organization and we look forward to a more fruitful interface in the future.” – Ambassador Hassan

Muhammad Hassan, DCM, Embassy of Nigeria

Keynotes

Dr. Douglas Jackson is an accomplished and inspirational keynote speaker who can speak first-hand about life in the most impoverished communities on the planet, building a non-profit from the ground up, and finding life’s passions.

His most compelling keynotes:

Purpose

Finding Your Purpose – Changing the World

Passion and purpose are the keys to a happy

life. Find your passion and purpose, and you

may change the world in the process. Dr.

Jackson inspires audiences to dig deeper into

what matters to each individual. As he would

say, “fire up your passion. That’s exciting stuff.”

Humanitarianism

Winning through giving.

Partnerships

Dr. Jackson discusses how Project C.U.R.E.

distributes supplies through personal

experience stories from many years working

in the field. Project C.U.R.E works with

communities and local doctors to find out

what is needed and what can be successfully

used in clinics.

Inspiration

Dr. Jackson discusses life and what we

as individuals value through his TEDx

talk at Arrowhead Ranch. Inspiring and

intriguing, this keynote address makes

the audience think deeply about life,

happiness and the human experience.

Passionaries

Vision, Communication, and Execution: The Common Triad
